docs.text: Welcome to the Cubepanion API documentation Relevant GitHub repositories for the project are the api , and the Laby addon . The project aims to make the addon more dynamic and less dependent on updates to the addon itself. With the extra benefit of being able to use the API for other projects. Services chests - Provides information about the Lobby Chest Hunter locations games - Provides information about the avaible games leaderboards - Provides information about game, and player leaderboards maps - Provides information about EggWars maps Project layout & deployment Each service is deployed as a seperate docker container, and served behind a nginx reverse proxy. There is a redis cache layer present, so you may so delayed updates to the API.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Relevant GitHub repositories for the project are the api , and the Laby addon . The project aims to make the addon more dynamic and less dependent on updates to the addon itself. With the extra benefit of being able to use the API for other projects.

docs.text: Each service is deployed as a seperate docker container, and served behind a nginx reverse proxy. There is a redis cache layer present, so you may so delayed updates to the API.
docs.title: Project layout & deployment

docs.text: Chests Service Provides locations of the Lobby Chest Hunter locations. And seasons, these seasons are not official and only used for internal seperation. This service is served under /cubepanion/chests Endpoints GET / Returns an array of ChestLocation s for the seasons currently active. GET /:season Returns an array of ChestLocation s for the specified season. GET /seasons/:active Returns an array of (active) Seaon s. Models ChestLocation { "seasons_name": "", "x": 0, "y": 0, "z": 0 } Season Simple string, representing the season name.
docs.title: Chest Service

docs.text: Provides locations of the Lobby Chest Hunter locations. And seasons, these seasons are not official and only used for internal seperation. This service is served under /cubepanion/chests

docs.title: GET /:season

docs.text: Returns an array of (active) Seaon s.
docs.title: GET /seasons/:active

docs.text: Simple string, representing the season name.
docs.title: Season

docs.text: Games Service Provides information about (active) games on the CubeCraft Games network. This service is served under /cubepanion/games Endpoints GET /:active Returns an array of (active) Game s. GET /game/:game Returns a Game object for the specified game. Models Game { "game": "", "display_name": "", "aliases": [""], "active": true, "score_type": "" }
docs.title: Games Service

docs.text: Provides information about (active) games on the CubeCraft Games network. This service is served under /cubepanion/games
docs.title: Games Service

docs.text: Returns an array of (active) Game s.
docs.title: GET /:active

docs.text: Returns a Game object for the specified game.
docs.title: GET /game/:game

docs.text: { "game": "", "display_name": "", "aliases": [""], "active": true, "score_type": "" }
docs.title: Game

docs.text: Leaderboard service Provides information about leaderboards on the CubeCraft Games network. Data is read by the Laby addon . This service is served under /cubepanion/leaderboard Endpoints GET /player/:name Returns an array LeaderboardRow s for the specified player. Each row in game. GET /game/:game Returns an array LeaderboardRow s for the specified game. The array will be 200 long. GET /game/:game/bounded Returns an array LeaderboardRow s for the specified game. The array will be 200 long. You must provide a start and end query parameter. Models LeaderboardRow { "game": "", "player": "", "position": 0, "score": 0, "unix_time_stamp": 0 } The score type should be loaded from the games-service. Load these once, on application startup and then periodically if needed. Don't make a new request each time. They hardly update.
docs.title: Leaderboard Service

docs.text: Provides information about leaderboards on the CubeCraft Games network. Data is read by the Laby addon . This service is served under /cubepanion/leaderboard

docs.title: GET /game/:game/bounded

docs.title: LeaderboardRow

docs.text: Maps Service Provides information about EggWars maps on the CubeCraft Games network. This service is served under /cubepanion/maps Endpoints GET / Returns an array of Map s. GET /:mapName Returns a Map object for the specified map. Models Map { "unique_name": "", "map_name": "", "team_size": 0, "layout": "", //double_cross, cross, triple_cross, or square "colours": "", "build_limit": 0, "generators": [`Generator`] } Converting the map colours may be a bit tricky, it's a stringed array. Addon code Generator { "unique_name": "", // The map name "ordering": 0, "gen_type": "", // diamond, gold, or iron "gen_location": "", // middle, semimiddle, or base "level": 0, "count": 0 }
docs.title: Maps Service

docs.text: Provides information about EggWars maps on the CubeCraft Games network. This service is served under /cubepanion/maps
